title: TACO BELL TAKES THE STEP AT NATIONAL LEVEL AND OPENS THE FIRST RESTAURANT OUTSIDE THE CAPITAL, IN CLUJ-NAPOCA - Taco Bell
text: TACO BELL TAKES THE STEP AT NATIONAL LEVEL AND OPENS THE FIRST RESTAURANT OUTSIDE THE CAPITAL, IN CLUJ-NAPOCA - Taco Bell Skip to content √ó Taco Bell Live Mas TACO BELL TAKES THE STEP AT NATIONAL LEVEL AND OPENS THE FIRST RESTAURANT OUTSIDE THE CAPITAL, IN CLUJ-NAPOCA Just days before the holidays, Taco Bell announces the nationwide expansion. The brand entered the Romanian market in October last year and has so far reached four units placed in shopping centers in Bucharest. The newest restaurant will be inaugurated in Iulius Mall in Cluj-Napoca, on Saturday, December 22nd. With an investment of 350,000 euros, he expects the people of Cluj to try the original products, of Mexican inspiration, and with a different experience, in the spirit of #livemas. The new unit will welcome the fans starting Saturday, December 22, in the food court area on the first floor of the Iulius Mall shopping center in Cluj-Napoca. The restaurant has an area of ‚Äã‚Äã110 square meters and is the result of an investment of 350,000 euros. ‚ÄúTaco Bell had excellent results in the first year of activity on the local market, through restaurants in Bucharest, so we wanted our products to be accessible nationally. Cluj-Napoca is part of the first set of destinations we are pursuing, being a city with an accelerated development, in recent years, from an economic perspective, as well as from a cultural, musical and culinary point of view. Cluj residents are open to new experiences and we are glad to be able to offer them the #livemas experience. In addition, the opening timing is very good, because the weekend before Christmas and, in general, the winter holidays, is a time when people go out a lot in the city and often come to the mall, for shopping, to spend time. quality with those close to you and, why not, to try new things. With this promise, we look forward to seeing them at Taco Bell, ‚Äù said Mark Hilton, CEO of Sphera Franchise Group. With the inauguration of this restaurant, Taco Bell has created 35 jobs, the new team being ready to serve customers starting Saturday, December 22, and offer them delicious, Mexican-inspired products such as: Crunchy Taco, Cheesy Bacon Fries Burrito, Quesadilla, Crunchwrap Supreme, Nachos Supreme or Churros.
